(2847x243+211)/64 mod 512 = 61. (2847x729+697)/128 mod 256 = 92. (2847x729+697)/256 mod 128 = 46. (2847x729+697)/512 mod 64 = 23. (2847x2187+2603)/1024 mod 32 = 3. (2847x6561+8833)/2048 mod 16 = 5.
